desc: ３ターンの間、炎属性の味方ユニット全員の防御力を５０％アップ

dictionary.lore: A protection seal made from a Paladin Stone in which the spirit of fire obtained from a Fire Eye is sealed. It increases the defense power of fire users. Many who wield fire are tempestuous, and often ignore their commander's orders. It is said that during the war, due to this tendancy they often equipped with these seals.

name: 炎護石
